name: SUKUR
description:
Gratitude is a first-person single-player horror game with a story. There is nothing to help you progress through the game.

Sensitive Content: This Game is not age appropriate products. Sudden sound, image, etc.

The plot of the game: Furkan is not satisfied with what he has and wants more money, so he decides to go into the treasure business. In this way, he meets the teacher who will help him. Hodja says he will help him if they share the treasure they are going to find. They take out the treasure, but Furkan kills the teacher there. This is why the Zuzula Tribe will haunt Furkan.

Developer's comment: If you have experienced events in the past that you do not want to remember about such events, or people who are afraid of the dark, have a heart condition, or are afraid of being alone, I recommend not playing.

Hint: Examine the forest and houses to continue in the game.

theme: A Village In Turkey.

Purpose: To escape from a village haunted by the Zuzula tribe.

You can talk to the people in the village.


All characters and events in this game have nothing to do with real people and institutions. It is completely imaginary.
